(OUP)","issue":"Supplement_1","license":[{"start":{"date-parts":[[2024,7,1]],"date-time":"2024-07-01T00:00:00Z","timestamp":1719792000000},"content-version":"vor","delay-in-days":0,"URL":"https:\/\/academic.oup.com\/pages\/standard-publication-reuse-rights"}],"content-domain":{"domain":[],"crossmark-restriction":false},"published-print":{"date-parts":[[2024,7,5]]},"abstract":"<jats:title>Abstract<\/jats:title>\n               <jats:sec>\n                  <jats:title>Introduction<\/jats:title>\n                  <jats:p>Health workers (HW) were a prioritised group when the COVID-19 vaccination campaign started in Germany at the end of December 2020. In an ecologic study, the progress of the vaccination campaign was correlated with the time trend of the severity of COVID-19 in HW.<\/jats:p>\n               <\/jats:sec>\n               <jats:sec>\n                  <jats:title>Materials and Methods<\/jats:title>\n                  <jats:p>Survey data on willingness to receive vaccination in HW were assessed. The number of COVID-19 related occupational diseases was assessed in the standardized data system of the responsible compensation board (BGW). The proportion of severe disease cases was calculated for every month in 2021. In addition, the proportion of severe COVID-19 in HW was assessed for the years 2022 to 2023. COVID-19 was considered severe when hospitalisation was required or when the sick leave was longer than six weeks.<\/jats:p>\n               <\/jats:sec>\n               <jats:sec>\n                  <jats:title>Results<\/jats:title>\n                  <jats:p>In December 2021 in most hospitals and nursing homes the vaccination rate in workers was 95% or higher. Albeit, there were some regional variations observed. Even though an increase in infected HW was observed starting in October 2021, the proportion of severe COVID-19 dropped to &amp;lt;0.05% in December from 2.7% in January 2021.<\/jats:p>\n               <\/jats:sec>\n               <jats:sec>\n                  <jats:title>Conclusions<\/jats:title>\n                  <jats:p>The vaccination campaign for HW in Germany was successful. Vaccination prevented severe COVID-19 in HW.<\/jats:p>\n
